No, [digital planners](https://affine.pro/templates/category-digital-planner) are not just static PDF files. They are interactive, customizable templates that are designed to be used within digital platforms and apps. Unlike traditional paper planners, digital planners often incorporate features such as task management, calendar integration, note-taking, and even collaboration capabilities. This allows users to actively engage with their planning process in a dynamic and efficient manner. ### Do people actually use digital planners? Yes, [digital planners](https://affine.pro/templates/category-digital-planner) have become increasingly popular in recent years, as more and more people embrace the benefits of digital organization and productivity tools. The flexibility, customization, and accessibility of digital planners have made them a preferred choice for individuals and teams across various industries and age groups. From students and professionals to entrepreneurs and homemakers, digital planners have become an essential part of many people's workflow and personal organization strategies. ### Do you need an iPad for digital planners? Many digital planner templates and apps are designed to be compatible with a range of devices, such as smartphones, tablets, and laptops running different operating systems, including Windows, Android, and iOS.
